mdcLink.allowedExtensions.description: List of file extensions to search for when resolving links (include dots, e.g., .ts, .js, .md)
mdcLink.enableForAllFiles.description: Enable/disable MDC links globally across all file types
mdcLink.searchPaths.description: Specific directories to search in (empty = search entire workspace)
mdcLink.excludePatterns.description: File/folder patterns to exclude from search
mdcLink.showFileIcons.description: Show file type icons in tooltips
mdcLink.suggestRecentFiles.description: Suggest recently used files in auto-completion
mdcLink.debugMode.description: Enable debug mode for detailed logging
